analyzed: thera vāda vinaya
mahāvibhaṅga
sekhiya kaṇḍa
suru suru vagga
chatta pāṇi sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū chatta pāṇissa dhammam desenti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū chatta pāṇissa dhammaṃ desessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave chattapāṇissa dhammam desetha ati
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisā chattapāṇissa dhammam desessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha
na chatta pāṇissa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṁ desetuṁ kukkuccāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chatta pāṇissa gilānassa dhammam desetum kukkuccāyanti
manussāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chattapāṇissa gilānassa dhammaṁ na desessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā chatta pāṇissa gilānassa dhammam na desessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
anujānāmi bhikkhave chatta pāṇissa gilānassa dhammam desetu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na chatta pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
chattam nāma

original: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi chattāni setacchatta kilañjacchatta paṇṇacchattam maṇḍalabaddham salākabaddha
dhammaḥ nāma

original: buddhabhāsito sāvakabhāsito isibhāsito devatābhāsito atthūpasañhito dhammūpasañhito.
analyzed: buddha bhāsitaḥ sāvaka bhāsitaḥ isi bhāsitaḥ devatā bhāsitaḥ atthu upasañhitaḥ dhammu upasañhitaḥ
deseyya ati

original: padena deseti, pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: padena deseti pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa
akkharāya deseti akkharakkharāya āpatti dukkaṭassa
na chatta pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca chatta pāṇissa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
anāpatti
a san cit ca pe
ādikammikassa ati
